OrgName.entry: STUDENT ADVICE CENTRE, UNIVERSITY OF SHEFFIELD UNION OF STUDENTS

Desc.entry: Provides advice in the following areas to University of Sheffield students: benefits, immigration, housing, consumer, tax, debt, student support, academic issues etc. Home visits. Helps with reviews and represents at tribunals. Specialist advisers on housing, money, immigration and academic issues. Self or any referral.
